alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Gillsburg, or 12 miles southwest of Mccomb, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Magnolia and Gillsburg. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 3 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
